Equate Ceramide Moisturizing PM Facial Lotion

Brand: Equate

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: WATER, GLYCERIN, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, CETEARETH-20, PHENOXYETHANOL, DIMETHICONE, POTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, DISODIUM EDTA, DIPOTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, EHTYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, CETYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE,

BUTYLENE GLYCOL, DISODIUM EDTA, DIPOTASSIUM PHOSPHATE, CETEARYL ALCOHOL, BEHENTRIMONIUM METHOSULFATE, EHTYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, NIACINAMIDE, CETYL ALCOHOL, SODIUM HYALURONATE, POLYGLYCERYL-3 DIISOSTEARATE, CERAMIDE NP, CERAMIDE AP, CERAMIDE EOP, PHYTOSPHINGOSINE, CHOLESTEROL, SODIUM LAUROYL LACTYLATE, CARBOMER, XANTHAN GUM.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
